2+1.sig_info: Contact with the Abomination's gamma-irradiated body has a 3 to 14.99% chance to Poison the target, reducing their Health recovery by 30% and dealing 53.94 Direct Damage over 12 seconds.

PASSIVE: Whenever Abomination bleeds, his irradiated blood has a 95% chance to Poison the enemy for 65.25 Direct Damage over 10 seconds.
An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
ALL ATTACKS: 12% chance to gain a Fury Buff for 6 seconds, granting +43.5 Attack.
